MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Botwnnog, Sarn and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further repair are needed on a faulty transformer and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:20 PM on 22nd January 2021.
